We propose within-subject double-blind cross-over neuroimaging study short-term ( 11 day ) treatment tolcapone ( vs. placebo ) . The BOLD fMRI data acquire subject perform work memory task ( Fractal N-back ) , sustain attention task ( Continuous Performance Task ; CPT ) , response inhibition task ( Go/No-Go ) . The primary outcome medication effect ( within subject ) task-related BOLD activation 24 hour abstinence . Changes behavioral performance subjective symptom examine relation brain activity change .
